creator: SoftServe Inc
descriptionHtml:
Innovation is about creating value from ideas. It can increase the likelihood of your business succeeding. But creating innovative ideas that the market wants, and delivering them quickly is difficult to do and to sustain.

SoftServe’s Innovation Platform is designed for corporate usage: to help companies harness ideas of their employees and collectively create innovations.
Innovation Platform delivers a framework for outside-in and crowdsourced ideation. No matter where you are in your journey, creativity and innovation are used in a systematic way to look beyond the usual, uncovering solutions that the target audience wants.

If your company is using SoftServe Innovation Platform, or you accepted an invitation to use it and created an account, install this app and login with your account to:

INVESTIGATE. Gather and share background and research.
IDEATE. Generate and share ideas—ideas that inspire newer, better ideas—through creative activities that encourage active participation.
DISCUSS. Comment, like, and dislike posts and ideas in real time.
VOTE. Choose the best idea.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Introduced possibility to create organizations in web version, feel free to try it out and access the organization you created from mobile app. Also, added an option of signing in to mobile app using Facebook, Google, and Apple ID if one of those options was priorly used to register on web app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Redesigned filters:
added external open challenges to filters and also Dashboard.
made Related to me filter available to all user roles
added filter by business categories
- Improved challenge details view
- Added label to indicate open (public) challenges
- Fixed bugs

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Dark theme is here
Pinned posts & ideas are displayed at the top of their lists for a quick access
Internal & External users can now join only Learn and Ideate stages of an open challenge
Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Voting flow—switch between voting rounds, clear your vote, view voting results, and more!
• Join Learn and Ideate stages instead of the whole challenge (perfect for hackathons)
• Pin ideas at the top of Ideate stage for a quick access
• Improved navigation
• Bug fixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
For challenges with template, add ideas with numeric (metrics) and text questions, so that users can describe their ideas more precisely.
View idea card with metrics and answers to questions from the template.
See your level as innovator, points and badges you've earned.
Check innovation levels and achievements of others.
Receive congrats popup when unlocking achievement.
Enjoy app performance thanks to backend optimization.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Made the following updates in tune with the web app:
Updated challenge cards, filters and sorting, and challenge chat
Added possibility to make & manage announcements
Updated dashboard
Made it possible to upload video and voice recordings to ideas and posts
Optimized backend to improve app performance

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Updated and redesigned filters to be consistent with web.
Added page with all challenge chats, easily accessible from main menu.
Added Leaderboard widget to user Achievements page to compare a user to top 3 innovators.
Redesigned activity to match changes in web app:
• created different types of activities with icons and color coding
• updated links to entities from activity items
• updated recipients
• added new events
Optimized backend to improve app performance.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Necessary updates to make mobile app and web app consistent: redesign of some screens and elements as the result (new way to navigate between stages).

- Possibility to manage the challenges on the go: add idea summary, close the challenge, move ideas to the right stage, and much more.
